For an all you can eat buffet, this place is pretty top notch!  I'm giving it 5 stars in comparison to other buffet restaurants in Barcelona, Based on food, quality, and service.They had a very impressive selection of food.  Cuts of meat (prepared on the grill, to order), and they even had things that I don't normally see at buffets.  They had beef cheeks, and they were SO TENDER!! Paella, fideua, and the salad bar was quite extensive.  I wish I had enough room in my tummy to sample it all...but I guess that's what return visits are for.  I went on a discount coupon, for 50% off, so it was completely worth it.  I think even for 20 euros it's still worth it.   The drinks, however were quite expensive.  2.50 for a bottle water or soda.Overall, I enjoyed the food and the staff were very friendly and attentive, and they ccleared plates very quickly.  I had a really great experience and I know this won't be my last time visiting El Puma
